channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Museums for visitors

item.title: Are Slovenian Museums And Galleries Accessible To The Visitors Of The Third Age?
item.description: The research was organised by members of the Education and Communication Group - a part of Slovenian Museum Association and it was carried on between January and October 2018 in 29 museums that means 1/3 of the whole museum and gallery community.
